results.title: A case of complete atrioventricular block with extremely high blood concentration of azelnidipine
results.text_hl: There was no occurrence of @<m>DISEASE_Atrioventricular_Block</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054537 @@@CAVB@@@ for 4 weeks, to present, following discontinuation of @CHEMICAL_azelnidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C061679 @@@azelnidipine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Ide N, Mochizuki A, Kagawa Y, Ito M. A case of complete atrioventricular block with extremely high blood concentration of azelnidipine J Pharm Health Care Sci. 2021 Dec 1;7(1):48. PMID: 34847962
citations.BibTeX: @article{34847962, title={A case of complete atrioventricular block with extremely high blood concentration of azelnidipine}, author={Ide N and Mochizuki A and Kagawa Y and Ito M}, journal={J Pharm Health Care Sci}, volume={7}, number={1}, pages={48}}

results.title: Effects of simvastatin on the development of the atrial fibrillation substrate in dogs with congestive heart failure.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ also attenuated @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@CHF@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Atrioventricular_Block</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054537 @@@conduction abnormalities@@@ (heterogeneity-index reduced from 1.5+/-0.1 to 1.1+/-0.1 and 1.0+/-0.1 at 20 and 80 mg/day, p<0.01) and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@atrial fibrosis@@@ (from 19.4+/-1.3% to 10.8+/-0.8% and 9.9+/-0.8% at 20 and 80 mg/day, p<0.01), while @CHEMICAL_Fenofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011345 @@@fenofibrate@@@ did not.

citations.NLM: Shiroshita-Takeshita A, Brundel BJ, Burstein B, Leung TK, Mitamura H, Ogawa S, Nattel S. Effects of simvastatin on the development of the atrial fibrillation substrate in dogs with congestive heart failure. Cardiovasc Res. 2007 Apr 1;74(1):75-84. PMID: 17270161
citations.BibTeX: @article{17270161, title={Effects of simvastatin on the development of the atrial fibrillation substrate in dogs with congestive heart failure.}, author={Shiroshita-Takeshita A and Brundel BJ and Burstein B and Leung TK and Mitamura H and Ogawa S and Nattel S}, journal={Cardiovasc Res}, volume={74}, number={1}, pages={75-84}}
